ygData.subject: Blued 2H Hammer
ygData.msgSnippet: I just saw this on EQ lizer, I don t know if anyone has talked about this at all, but here s the info on it MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM Blued 2H Hammer Race: = all
ygData.messageBody:
I just saw this on EQ'lizer, I don't know if anyone has talked about this at all, but here's the
info on it

MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM
Blued 2H Hammer
Race: = all
Class: = WAR, CLR, SHD, SHM, DRU, MNK
Skill: = 2H Blunt
WT: = 13.0
DMG: = 21
Delay: = 45
Special: = Project Lighting *no charges showen or needed*

I would LOVE all info anyone has , that's *FACT* on this weapon, where it is located, etc or how to
do it if it's a quest item. I would love to find this and get this, please send me info.

Thulgar
